Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: We need to produce labeled activities with rationale. Well identify phases: idle initial low values, cutting high temp vibration flow tool movement, assembling moderate temp pressure flow, welding very high temp vibration energy, cooling inspection temp drop low activity, final idle.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Provide mapping of event numbers to phases.

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: Use tables maybe. Ensure LaTeX inline. Use double $$ for display math if needed. Provide final answer.
